A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the worst films I have ever seen (and I've seen some terrible movies in my time). 1 dimensional characters that are inconsistent and ridiculous; plot holes; boring slow motion chase scenes that last the whole movie\, 30 minute pointless scene in the middle of the movie; no link to the previous movies; no direction for the subsequent movies; flat jokes that are completely out of character; stiff direction with failed attempts to subvert expectations that become boringly predictable after the first few minutes of the movie.....
